body:
This treats some zero-sized (empty) tensors as contiguous and some as non-contiguous depending on the ordering of the dimensions.

We should treat all empty tensors as contiguous.
body_html:
This treats some zero-sized (empty) tensors as contiguous and some as non-contiguous depending on the ordering of the dimensions.

We should treat all empty tensors as contiguous.
body_text:
This treats some zero-sized (empty) tensors as contiguous and some as non-contiguous depending on the ordering of the dimensions.
We should treat all empty tensors as contiguous.
